tool_description: Calculates estimated costs for repairing identified defects and improvements, providing budget ranges for different quality levels and repair approaches.

defect_list.description: List of defects requiring repair cost estimation

property_location.description: City and state for regional cost adjustments

repair_quality.description: Desired repair quality level: basic, standard, premium

property_size.description: Property square footage for scaling estimates

urgency_level.description: Repair urgency affecting labor costs: normal, expedited, emergency

include_permits.description: Whether to include permit costs in estimates

material_quality.description: Material quality preference: economy, standard, premium

bulk_discount.description: Apply bulk repair discounts for multiple items

error_messages: Empty defect list: Provide at least one defect for cost estimation.
Invalid repair quality: Use one of [basic, standard, premium].
Invalid property size: Property size must be greater than 0.
Invalid urgency level: Use one of [normal, expedited, emergency].
Invalid contractor markup: Markup must be between 10 and 50 percent.
Invalid material quality: Use one of [economy, standard, premium].
usage: Provide defect_list, property_location, repair_quality, and property_size as minimum requirements; adjust optional parameters for more precise cost estimates based on specific project needs.

cost_breakdown.description: Detailed cost breakdown by defect category

permit_cost.description: Total estimated permit and fee costs

cost_confidence.description: Confidence level of estimates: high, medium, low
